SUMMARY: NESTED | FIELD | CONSTR | METHOD DETAIL: FIELD | CONSTR | METHOD

com.esri.mo2.ui.lyt
Class Page

java.lang.Object
  |
  +--com.esri.mo2.ui.lyt.Page
public class Page
extends Object

This class defines characteristics for a printable page. Be aware of the fact that some printers such as HP LaserJet 4050 TN, doesn't give accurate information about its printing margins when it's queried from a printing API. So the printer margin bounding box shown in the page may not reflect the actual printer margins.
